mapper.select: select * from solo_contest where title like '%${contestTitle}%'
mapper.insert: insert into solo_contest(title, start_time, end_time, sign_start_time, sign_end_time, school_id, chief, phone, email, num_max) values (#{contestTitle}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{signStartTime}, #{signEndTime}, #{schoolId}, #{chief}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{numMax})
insert into solo_contest_record(solo_contest_id, student_id, is_starred) values (#{soloContestId}, #{studentId}, #{isStarred})
mapper.delete: delete from solo_contest_record where solo_contest_id = #{soloContestId} and student_id = #{studentId}
mapper.select: select COUNT(Z.student_id) from solo_contest_record as Z where Z.contest_id = #{soloContestId} and Z.student_id in ( select id from student where student.school_id = #{schoolId})

select S.school_name as schoolName, S.abbr_name as abbrName, ST.stu_id as stuId, ST.stu_name as stuName, CONCAT(ST.family_name, ' ', ST.first_name) as stuForeignName, ST.phone, ST.email, ST.sex as sex, ST.size as size, from school as S, student as ST, solo_contest as C, solo_contest_record as R where S.school_id = ST.school_id and ST.id = R.student_id and C.id = R.solo_contest_id
